#Data preperation


##Clean Data hier nochmal drüber schauen
```{r}
data2 <- data[!(data$ALTER < 18 | data$ALTER >= 75 | data$ATTENTION_CHECK != 1), ]

table(data2$ATTENTION_CHECK)
describe(data2$ALTER)
table(data$ATTENTION_CHECK)

describe(data2)
```


##Age Groups
```{r}
data$AGE_GROUP <- NA
data$AGE_GROUP <- factor(
  data$AGEGROUP,
  levels = c(1,2),
  labels = c("18-29", "30-75")
)

data$AGE_GROUP[which(data$ALTER >= 18 & data$ALTER <=29 )] <- "18-29"
data$AGE_GROUP[which(data$ALTER >= 30 & data$ALTER <= 75 )] <- "30-75"

summary(data$AGE_GROUP)

agegroupwave <- c(
  "1" = "18-21",
  "2" = "22-25"
)
```

##Gender Groups
```{r}
data$GENDER_GROUP <- NA
data$GENDER_GROUP <- factor(
  data$GENDER_GROUP,
  levels = c(1,2,3,4),
  labels = c("Weiblich","Männlich","Divers","Keine Angabe")
)

data$GENDER_GROUP[which(data$GESCHLECHT == 1)] <- "Weiblich"
data$GENDER_GROUP[which(data$GESCHLECHT == 2)] <- "Männlich"
data$GENDER_GROUP[which(data$GESCHLECHT == 3)] <- "Divers"
data$GENDER_GROUP[which(data$GESCHLECHT == 4)] <- "Keine Angabe"

summary(data$GENDER_GROUP)
```

##Education Groups
```{r}
data$EDUCATION_GROUP <- NA
data$EDUCATION_GROUP <- factor(
data$EDUCATION_GROUP,
levels = c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7),
labels = c("Hauptschulabschluss","Mittlere Reife","Fachhochschulreife","Allgemeine Hochschulreife","Bachelor","Master","Andere")
)

data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 1)] <- "Hauptschulabschluss"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 2)] <- "Mittlere Reife"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 3)] <- "Fachhochschulreife"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 4)] <- "Allgemeine Hochschulreife"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 5)] <- "Bachelor"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 6)] <- "Master"
data$EDUCATION_GROUP[which(data$BILDUNG == 7)] <- "Andere"

summary(data$EDUCATION_GROUP)
```
